meanings.definition: A person who persists in a course of action despite opposition or difficulty.
meanings.sent1: The persisters in the group never gave up on their project, no matter how hard it got.
meanings.sent2: She is a true persister, always pushing forward even when things get tough.
meanings.sent3: The persister in the race kept going even when everyone else stopped to rest.
meanings.sent4: Like a determined persister, the little ant carried the heavy leaf back to its nest.
meanings.sent5: The persister in the story inspired everyone with their unwavering determination.

meanings.definition: A group of bacteria that are resistant to antibiotics.
meanings.sent1: The persisters in the lab were difficult to treat with antibiotics.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are concerned about the spread of antibiotic-resistant persisters.
meanings.sent3: The persisters in the petri dish seemed to mock the effectiveness of the antibiotics.
meanings.sent4: The persisters multiplied rapidly, showing their defiance against the medication.
meanings.sent5: The persisters in the experiment proved to be a formidable challenge for the researchers.
